headline: Moody's (MCO) Valuation: Is There Untapped Long-Term Potential After This Week’s Modest Share Rise?
summary: Moody's (MCO) shares have edged slightly higher this week, moving up around 2% over the past seven days. The company's performance comes after a month where the stock saw a small dip. See our latest analysis for Moody's. While Moody's has seen a modest pick-up this week, its share price momentum seems balanced after a mild dip last month. Looking at the broader trend, shareholders have enjoyed a 1-year total return of 6% with even stronger compound gains over the last three and five years...
